featured.text: At least one group, Intervac, has been facilitating such an arrangement since 1953.

Strong command of English language OPENINGS***************************** ﹪ Chinese speaking and reading ability a must TOUR GUIDES ﹪ a university degree Duties: To conduct escorted tours for foreign visitors; ﹪ Journalism education and/or experience a plus to assist with travel and transportation arrangements.

definition.en_def: The act of organizing or putting things in a specific order.
definition.example: The arrangement of the flowers made the room look beautiful.
